title: Mime over matter
creator_credit: Gene Deitch, Morton Schindel, Kratky Film and Sim Productions
brief_description: Examines the use of pantomime to explore ideas and provoke open-ended discussion of such topics as man’s relationship to the material objects that make his life comfortable. Features Ladislav Fialka and his Prague Pantomime.
creator_credit_for_label: Gene Deitch, Morton Schindel, Kratky Film and Sim Productions
